title: Expose web3_clientVersion via EngineAPI
body:
<!-- Have you done the following? -->

<!--     comply with it, including treating everyone with respect: -->
<!--     https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md -->

<!--   * Read the debugging docs: https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/HowTo/Monitor/Logging/ -->

<!-- Note:  Not all sections will apply to all issue types. -->

### Description
As an Consensus Client, I want access to my execution clients name and version over the Engine API so that I can include it in my proposed block grafitti.

https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/517/files 

### Acceptance Criteria
* Proposed blocks from any CL include the besu version by default.
